Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesMandatory Skill set & Tools : React JS, HTML5, CSS3, Java script Primary Skills : HTML5, React, UI design aspects, Javascript, JQuery, GIT & version control, Responsive design, Android and IoS app development, Progressive web app, Testing & Debugging skills, JIRA, Bug Zilla, Confluence, Sharepoints.Secondary Skills : Spring MVC, Java 1.8 and above, Angular, UI Load testing, REST Web services, Basic shell commands, Linux, Good written, verbal and presentation skills, Soft Spoken, Pro-activeRole :- Understand the design requirements from UX- Development of UI and the implementation of front-end business logic- Collaboration with UX and backend team for data population- Working experience into Agile and scrum methodologies
UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, B.Sc in Any Specialization
